name: TDX_XS_FUNC_GUEST_MEM_ACPT_CAL_NEW
cmdline: cd ddt_intel/lkvs/guest-test && ./guest.test_launcher.sh -v 1 -s 1 -m 16 -d on -t tdx -f tdx -x TD_MEM_ACPT_CAL -c "accept_memory=lazy" -p off
summary: Calculate based on nr_unaccepted in /proc/vmstat and Unaccepted in /proc/meminfo for correct unaccepted memory info mapping
